items.sentence: I wish that Tom would stay in Australia until Christmas.
I thought Tom and Mary were supposed to be in Australia.
I thought you said Tom didn't live in Australia anymore.
I should tell Tom that I won't go to Australia with him.
It makes no difference to me whether you're rich or not.
We allowed some things to happen that we shouldn't have.
Tom was drinking coffee from a disposable styrofoam cup.
Tom obviously wasn't glad that that was going to happen.
Are there any students in this class who walk to school?
I would've never expected something like this to happen.
Tom saw Mary sitting by herself in the back of the room.
What kind of problems do you think that Tom could cause?
You won't have to worry about this ever happening again.
Are you sure you want to park that close to the bonfire?
The weather report says it will rain tomorrow afternoon.
What would people think if I didn't go to Tom's wedding?
The bag was so heavy that I couldn't carry it by myself.
When their eyes met, it was as if the world stood still.
Tom asked Mary to help him, but she refused to help him.
You shouldn't open the door because the baby's sleeping.
There's a new industrial plant in the north of the city.
The stew tasted even better today than it did yesterday.
I lived in the house across the street for three months.
Tom was sitting by himself on the porch, reading a book.
I'll lend this book to you if you return it next Monday.
While Tom was in the bath, Mary secretly read his diary.
I paid twice as much for my bicycle as Tom paid for his.
Tom has been practicing driving in an empty parking lot.
That's not the main reason Tom shouldn't have done that.
When was the last time you bought flowers for your wife?
I admire the way you handled yourself in that situation.
No one could've imagined that Tom would die before Mary.
We are all looking forward to seeing you and your family.
I have several recordings of Beethoven\'s Fifth Symphony.
I have the feeling that Tom doesn\'t know how to do that.
I keep saying that I\'m innocent, but no one will listen.
I\'ve already waited two hours. I can\'t wait any longer.
I assumed because we\'re brothers that I could trust you.
I can\'t explain it any better than that. I wish I could.
I think it\'s not a good idea to let children drink wine.
I think it\'s time for me to discuss the matter with him.
I think that that\'s exactly what Tom is expecting to do.
I don\'t think it\'s safe to go out at night by yourself.
Did you see the sunrise earlier? It was really beautiful.
Tom could hardly wait to see Mary and the children again.
Tom is still doing the same thing he was doing yesterday.
Tom jumped into the water without taking off his clothes.
The Prime Minister will hold a press conference tomorrow.
The last few days have been terribly busy for both of us.
The new subway enables me to get to school in 20 minutes.
